attributes.action: make it illegal to breed or import pitbulls to England
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Pitbulls were created by man to be a fighting dog, it has already killed a lot of children and even full grown men, every year there are thousands of incidents where pitbulls literally BUTCHER people. I would like to live in a society where i can walk my dog and raise my children without having to worry about deadly attacks. Please sign it.....we can make a difference.
